provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Act may be cited as the Larceny (Amendment) Act, 2013, Short title and
and shall be read and construed as one with the Larceny Act construction.
(hereinafter referred to as the ''principal Act") and all amendments
thereto.
2               [No. ]        The Larceny (Amendment) Act, 2013
Amendment         2. Section 13 of the principal Act is amended by deleting the
of section 13
of principal    words ... and, if a male. in addition thereto, to be whipped".
Act
Savings and        3.-(1) Nothing in this Act shall, except as specified in
transitional.
                subsection (2), be construed as affecting any sentence ofwhipping
                duly carried out pursuant to section 13 ofthe principal Act, prior to
                the commencement date.
                     (2) A sentence pursuant to section 13 ofthe principal Act
                whichÂ­
                       (a) is handed down prior to the commencement date; and
                       (b) imposes whipping as part ofthe sentence,
                shall not, to the extent ofthe whipping only, be carried out in whole
                or in part on or after the commencement date.
                       (3) In this section "commencement date" means the date
                on which this Act comes into operation.
Act binds the     4.     This Act binds the Crown.
Crown.
